title: Tho' Shadows Deepen
lyrics:
Tho’ shadows deepen,
And my heart bleeds,
I will not question
The way He leads,
This side of Heaven,
We know in part
I will not question
A broken heart

Chorus
We’ll talk it over in the bye and bye
We’ll talk it over, my Lord and I
I’ll ask the reasons He’ll tell me why,
When we talk it over
In the bye and bye

I’ll trust His leading.
He’ll never fail,
Thro’ darkest tunnels
Or misty vale,
Obey His bidding
And faithful be,
Tho’ only one step
Ahead I see

I’ll hide my heartache
Behind a smile,
And wait for reasons
Till after while, and tho’ He try me
I know I’ll find
That all my burdens are silver lined
